sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Merck ( MRK ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.3%.
Year to date, Merck registers a 19.2% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Chevron ( CVX ), trading down 1.5%.
Chevron is lower by about 7.9% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are JPMorgan Chase ( JPM ), trading down 1.5%, and Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading up 1.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
